title: The Columbus Dispatch: Local News, Politics & Sports in Columbus, OH
text:
OSU trustees give Carter OK to increase tuition after state budget

Incoming freshman at Ohio State University might be facing a tuition increase. How much exactly will they have to pay? That's to be determined.
